hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Tha'labah Al-Khushani that :The Prophet [SAW] saw a gold ring on his hand, and he started to smack him with a stick that he had in his hand. When the Prophet [SAW] looked away, he threw it away. He said: "I think that he hurt you or we made you lose money

chapter.ara-name: باب حَدِيثِ أَبِي هُرَيْرَةَ وَالاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى قَتَادَةَ
chapter.eng-name: The Hadith of Abu Hurairah and the Differences Reported from Qatadah
